text: 3 Generation : OO & Classes * Classes represents real world objects * Group functions into classes * Objects = DATA + FUNCTIONALITY Class StarsProgram © int NumStars =10 E Function Main() - F string x 1] do o call DrawStars (NumStars ) H INPUT "Do you want another go Yes/No" , x =8 While x = "Yes" ﬁ o End Function E Function DrawStars( dim num as integer) s inti g FORi=1TO num ki PRINT E Next | End Function End Class
